componentDescription: This component provides a navigational link that can render children, manage external links, and apply various text decoration styles.

children.description: Represents the content within the Link component which can be any valid React node.

underline.description: Optional prop to define the text decoration style of the link as underline views.

isExternal.description: Optional boolean indicating whether the link points to an external resource. Default behavior may vary based on this value.

iconSize.description: Optional prop to set the size of an icon if present within the link.

to.description: The href attribute specifying the URL the link points to.

views.description: Optional styles object to customize the appearance using predefined style types.

isHovered.description: Indicates whether the link is under a hover state, which may adjust the link's style.

setIsHovered.description: A function to update the hover state of the link.
